roleset.name: provide water for farming, clean out with liquid

example.name: the Holy Land
example.text: Tolek Alterman had returned from the colonies in Palestine and , before the national leadership , exalted the miracles of [*] drying up swamps and irrigating the desert .

roleset.note: IRRIGATE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from irrigate.01-v)
IRRIGATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in Temprel data. Comparison to irrigate. Framed by Katie. (from irrigation.01-n)
